data.fullContent: Reptile nostrils are sort of nondescript, so let's make some nice nostrils like a snorting bull might have. You can use the technique from Spin a goblet to model one nostril, then duplicate it, rotate the pair until they look fierce, and give them a nice color like the dark red brown I picked. Then put them in place and parent them to the body.
data.answer: 爬行动物的鼻孔是难以描述的，所以让我们做一些不错的鼻孔，像一头喷鼻的公牛会有的那样。你可以用旋转高脚杯的技巧来模拟一个鼻孔，然后复制它，两个一起旋转，直到它们看起来很凶猛，然后给它们上一个漂亮的颜色，比如我挑选的深红棕色。然后把它们放在适当的位置，再把它们按在身体上。
